name: Aesthetic Workout Planner | Notion Template
description: Introducing the Ultimate Aesthetic Workout Planner in Notion!This Workout Planner is specifically designed with you in mind. This planner is perfect for you if you love to stay active and organized with a touch of cuteness. With its custom design and functionality, it adds a pop of fun to your fitness journey.This planner offers comprehensive pre built pages for: Home dashboard that includes: Today's Workouts Week at glance Workout planner - easily search the pre-loaded workouts or add your own
features: Home dashboard that includes:Today's WorkoutsWeek at glance; Today's Workouts; Week at glance; Workout planner -easily search the pre-loaded workouts or add your own; Workout log -daily workout log to track your progress and completed workout,  to help you stay on top of your fitness goals; Exercise Database -includes over 50+ preloaded workouts, fully customizableTrack sets, reps and weightAdd favoritesSet difficultyEmbed video linksand more!; Track sets, reps and weight; Add favorites; Set difficulty; Embed video links
